acceptedAnswer.text: AEO is the practice of optimizing content to be directly cited by AI models and answer engines like ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Google's AI Overviews. Unlike SEO which focuses on ranking in search results, AEO focuses on being the source AI models cite when answering questions.

mainEntity.name: How much does AEO consulting cost?

acceptedAnswer.text: AEO consulting rates range from $200/hour for initial consultation to $350/hour for executive strategy sessions. Project-based pricing is also available starting at $2,500 for small implementations.

The Zero-Click Paradigm describes the shift from traditional search (where users click through to websites) to AI-mediated discovery (where AI models provide direct answers without clicks). Published in our whitepaper (DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.18140739), it outlines how businesses must adapt to maintain visibility.

mainEntity.name: Do you offer implementation services or just consulting?

acceptedAnswer.text: We offer both. Consulting services ($200-$350/hour) provide strategic guidance, while our Done-For-You Agency Services ($3,000-$10,000+/month) handle complete implementation including schema markup, content optimization, and ongoing maintenance.

mainEntity.name: How long does it take to see results from AEO optimization?

acceptedAnswer.text: Initial improvements in AI citation accuracy typically appear within 30-60 days as AI models re-crawl and update their knowledge bases. Full optimization results, including increased zero-click visibility, usually manifest within 90-120 days.

mainEntity.name: What's the difference between your research site (drewis.ai) and commercial site (drewisintelligence.com)?

acceptedAnswer.text: drewis.ai hosts our peer-reviewed research, publications (with Zenodo DOIs), and the Zero-Click Laws framework. drewisintelligence.com is our commercial site offering consulting, implementation services, and digital products based on that research.

The Zero-Click Laws v1.0 (DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.18305065) are an empirical framework describing how AI-mediated discovery systems behave. They define ten fundamental laws governing how AI models select, cite, and present information to users without requiring clicks to source websites.

mainEntity.name: Do you work with small businesses or only enterprises?

acceptedAnswer.text: We work with businesses of all sizes. Our digital products ($17-$67) are perfect for DIY implementation, consulting services ($200-$350/hour) work for small to mid-size businesses, and our agency retainers ($3,000-$10,000+/month) scale from small businesses to enterprises.

Structural Authority is a prescriptive standard (DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.18305446) defining how digital assets must be organized for AI discoverability. It includes requirements for schema markup, identity verification (MS Partner ID, Wikidata), and machine-readable data feeds.

mainEntity.name: Can I implement AEO myself or do I need to hire you?

acceptedAnswer.text: Both options are available. Our digital products (like the Zero-Click Authority Playbook for $67) provide step-by-step DIY implementation guides. If you prefer expert guidance, consulting services start at $200/hour. For hands-off implementation, our Done-For-You Agency Services handle everything.
